name: +Vita+
description:
Delving into one mind is as exciting as it is dangerous. 
Some may see something they do not wish to see, not because what they witness horrify them, but because they may see what they need to, but not what they want to.

Such is life. Such is Vita. 



Vita is a short VR horror experience and my very first solo dev project.
Special thanks to these kind folks from Freesound for their assets!

  • -Megashroom_Shovel-gong
